revised_title: An In-depth Study of Blood Constitution and Muscular Tissue Nutrition
tldr: The author investigates the composition of blood and the nutrition of muscular tissue, discovering that blood is a colloid fluid with diffusible constituents, and that muscular tissue is formed of three different classes of substances. The study also reveals the importance of the transformation of crystalloids into colloids and vice versa in the process of nourishment and the functioning of living organisms.
